edit: Na bāhuppacālakaṃ antaraghare nisīdissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 18. I will not sit swinging my arms in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๑๘. พึงทำศึกษาว่า”เราจักไม่ไกวแขนนั่งในละแวกบ้าน”
18. I shall not sit fidgetting (gesticulating with) the arms in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
